##2011
###Primer Trimestre

```{r}
library(foreign)
library(haven)
library(dplyr)
t1.2011 <- read.spss("D://Trabajo-Final-Turismo-Receptivo/r1t11.sav", to.data.frame = TRUE)
t1.2011a<- t1.2011%>%
  select(gente, destino, estadia, gtogrup, nac, aloja, motivo, entro, menos15, ent1529, ent3064, mas65, fmenos15, f15a29, f30a64, fmas64, gpaq, gfptot, gfpalo, galoj, gfpali, galim, gfptra, gtrans, gfpcult, gcult, gfptur, gtur, gfpcomp, gcomp, gfpotr, gresto, gtotal)
  
```

```{r}
t4.2015 <- read.spss("D:\\Trabajo-Final-Turismo-Receptivo/R4T15.sav", to.data.frame = TRUE)

 by_Entro <- t4.2015  %>% mutate(Gente1= Gente*coef) %>% select(Entro, Gente1) %>% group_by(Entro) %>% summarise(n= sum(Gente1))
 
 by_Entro
 
 
 by_Destino <- t4.2015  %>% mutate(Gente1= Gente*coef) %>% select(Destino, Gente1) %>% group_by(Destino) %>% summarise(n= sum(Gente1))
 by_Destino
 
 
```
